content: Generate a sentence where all words start with the last letter of the previous word.

Sure! Here's a sentence where each word starts with the last letter of the previous word: "Elephants sleep peacefully, quietly yearning for green pastures, serene and tranquil." In this sentence, "Elephants" starts with 'E', and 'sleep' starts with 's', which is the last letter of 'Elephants', and so on.
